title: Good Samaritans save a driver having a medical issue at a busy intersection - NPR
content:
1. Good Samaritans save a driver having a medical issue at a busy intersection  NPR
  2. Good Samaritans help unconscious driver in Broward  WPLG Local 10
  3. Watch A Group Of Good Samaritans Rush Into Traffic To Stop Moving Car  HuffPost
  4. Group of good Samaritans help stop moving vehicle after woman suffers medical episode in Boynton Beach  WPBF West Palm Beach
  5. Florida police release video of Good Samaritans racing to rescue woman who had medical emergency while driving  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: When a driver experienced a medical episode and was drifting into an intersection, people around her sprang into action and saved everyone on the road from a potentially life-threatening crash.
